com.konakart.bl.modules.ordertotal

Interface OrderTotalInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuyXGetYFree, ExternalTax, FreeProduct, GiftCertificate, PaymentCharge, ProductDiscount, ProductRewardPoints, RedeemPoints, RewardPoints, Shipping, ShippingDiscount, Subtotal, Tax, TaxCloud, Total, TotalDiscount, TotalDiscountAdmin

    public interface OrderTotalInterface
    Interfaces to be implemented by Order Total Modules

      • getPromotionResult

        PromotionResult getPromotionResult(Product product,
                                   Promotion promotion)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns an object containing the promotion discount. This method is used to apply the promotion to a single product.

        promotion - the promotion

        Returns a PromotionResult object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • commitOrder

        void commitOrder(OrderIf order)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Commit the Order transaction. Typically used to commit order transactions in tax service modules (such as Avalara).
        Parameters:
        order - the order
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception if something unexpected happens
